1.ara-name: كتاب الطهارة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abdur-Rahman bin Awf's Umm Walad said, :"I said to Umm Salamah: 'Indeed I am a woman with lengthy hems, and I walk in places of filth.' So she said: 'Allah's Messenger said: "It is purified by what comes after it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْوُضُوءِ مِنَ الْمَوْطَإِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Wudu Due To What One Has Walked In
